bio:
Huifang Ma was a Chinese instructor at NYU Shanghai. She holds a master’s degree from Yunnan Normal University.

Ma has been teaching Chinese for over 10 years and earned her Senior Certificate of Teaching Chinese as a Foreign Language from the National Education Department. She taught students of various skill levels at East China Normal University, Shanghai Jiaotong University, and Yunnan Normal University. In addition, she taught at numerous Chinese language programs in association with educational institutions, including, but not limited to, UCLA, Kazakhstan Group, and Korea Kyung Hee University.

Research Interests

  • Chinese grammar
  • Chinese culture
  • Chinese history

Courses Taught

  • Elementary Chinese I
  • Elementary Chinese I - FoS1
  • Elementary Chinese I - FoS2

Education

  • MA, Chinese History, Yunnan Normal University, 2004
  • BS, Chinese Language and Literature Education, Hebei Normal University, 2000
